subject: Scottish Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson broke out of his slump with an eight-under 64 at the Scottish Open in Inverness, leaving him five shots off the second-round lead shared by Alexander Noren and Francesco Molinari.
snippet: Phil Mickelson broke out of his slump with an eight-under 64 at the Scottish Open in Inverness, leaving him five shots off the second-round lead shared by Alexander Noren and Francesco Molinari.
